sentences.en: When the scoreboard was built, no one thought a score of 10.
sentences.cn: 当记分牌制作出来的时候，没有人想到10分。

sentences.en: The figures flash up on the scoreboard.
Their "scoreboard" requires little or no interaction from the user other than to look and to wear an active badge.
sentences.cn: 他们的“分数板”需要寻找以及活动徽章的佩戴，而要求很少或不要求来自用户的交互。
